Attendance
Firebase + Google Sign In Use a Google Sign In credential to authenticate with Firebase.
Firebase + Facebook Login Use a Facebook Login credential to authenticate with Firebase.
Firebase + Twitter Login Use a Twitter Login credential to authenticate with Firebase.
Login/Logout Use an email and password to authenticate with Firebase.
Anonymous Authentication Sign in anonymously and then later upgrade to a full Firebase Auth user..
Custom Authentication Use a custom token signed by your own server to authenticate with Firebase.
Storage Upload camera image to Firebase, download image from Firebase.
Database Database Firebase example.

Server name. Server name to which you want to connect, for example www.edcom.sk, without http:\\ Mail username. Mail - username for login to Firebase. User password. Password for login to Firebase. Number of company. Number of company to which you want to connect. Accounting year. Accounting year for attendance. Type of User. Set App by login. Admin, common user.... User is admin. 0=no, 1=yes Company of User. ID of Company where user work. ID number of User. ID number of User at Company where user work. User at work. 1-user at work, 0-user leav work. Name of user. Name of logged user.

Click the SUBSCRIBE TO NEWS button below to subscribe to the news topic. Messages sent to the news topic will be received. The LOG TOKEN button logs the InstanceID token to logcat. Subscribe To News Log Token Subscribed to news topic InstanceID Token: %s
